author: Richard Cole
comment: Beautiful on Smartwatch 3, wish I could change from km/h to mph though. For those complaining about it wanting you to purchase again, have you selected this face and not the free version? Worked fine for me.
title: Lovely designed watch face.

author: Tanner Tipping
comment: Will revise after its fixed. Even though I paid for the full version, it did not unlock the promised features. It acts like it's not installed.
title: Not working on moto 360

author: Thomas Skou Dale
comment: I just bought it, but are still not able to change anything. It just tells me to buy it again.
title: Can't change anything..

author: Dilip Ranade
comment: Even after paying for the premium edition the additional features do not work on my rooted Gear 2 with android wear ROM.  Disappointed.
title: Premium features not working

author: Jesse Taylor
comment: Bought this app ; dosen't work ; says buy again. Don't google apps work anymore.
title: Accountant

author: Aleksi Torniainen
comment: Bought app and doesnt work ask to buy again WTF!

author: Fadi McKean
comment: I purchased the pro mode and still not reflected and the watch and it is still telling me to buy the pro version again
title: Bug fix is needed

author: Stuart Thirlwell
comment: Every time I open the Android Wear app to change the settings it crashes.
title: Keeps crashing

author: Tom Brock
comment: Stick with the FREE version,  not worth paying for features as there is just two,, change from C to F.   and Light to Dark,,,   why bother,, other items are still in metric.   Just not worth any money to change.  Others by this same author is same way.  not worth paying for

author: Lisa Gonzalez
comment: Purchased the pro and it isn't working. Keeps telling me to buy the pro. Can't get to the settings...
title: Not working

author: don adams
comment: Once I figured out that when I bought the full version it was configured in a different watchface that was installed
title: Like it

author: Jade Beesley
comment: Would be better with a 24hour option!

author: Tyler Seabolt
comment: This app crashes when trying to adjust the settings, which is unfortunate, because the watch face is one of the nicer faces I've found on the app store.
title: Looks great, doesn't work.

author: joseph patten
comment: I had Pro version. Kept saying I needed to upgrade. Have a Moto 360. Would like to try a working app.
title: Does not work

author: Tony Alexander
comment: Upgraded to Pro and app did not update. Had to request refund.
title: Pro Version Not Working
